title: Samsung is rolling out another new update for the Galaxy Watch 4 with May security patch
content:
Keeping up its unofficial schedule of releasing roughly one update each month, Samsung has just released another new update for the Galaxy Watch 4 that delivers the May 2022 security patch and more.

moreâ€¦

The post Samsung is rolling out another new update for the Galaxy Watch 4 with May security patch appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Rolling out now, the Galaxy Watch 4 is being updated with the May 2022 security patch alongside some other under the hood tweaks.
